title: KKOT WebUI
subtitle: Sign in to your account or create a new one

login.title: Sign In
login.description: Sign in to your existing account

register.title: Sign Up
register.description: Create a new account. The first user will automatically become an administrator.

messages.loginFailed: Login failed: Please check your email or password.
messages.registerPasswordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
messages.registerInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email format.

errors.credentialsRequired: Please enter both email and password.

guest.loginSuccess: Guest account login successful. Redirecting to pending approval page.

invalidAccess.title: Access Denied
invalidAccess.description: There is an issue with your account

reasons.title: Access has been restricted for one of the following reasons:

invalidAccess.recovery: Please contact the administrator if you need to recover your account.

pendingAccess.title: Account Pending Approval
pendingAccess.info: Registration is complete, but administrator approval is required to use the service.

emailNotice.title: You will be notified by email when approved
emailNotice.checkSpam: Please check your spam folder as well

pendingAccess.contact: Please contact the administrator if you have any questions

guestAccess.title: Guest Access
guestAccess.info: You are currently logged in with guest permissions. The following features are restricted:

upgrade.title: Need full access?
upgrade.description: Request permission upgrade from the administrator.

guestAccess.contact: Contact the administrator if you need permission upgrade.

errors.signin: An error occurred while starting OAuth login.
errors.callback: An error occurred while processing OAuth callback. Please check the callback URL in Google Console.
errors.createAccount: An error occurred while creating OAuth account.
errors.emailCreateAccount: An error occurred while creating email account.
errors.callbackGeneral: An OAuth authentication callback error occurred.
errors.accountNotLinked: This email is already registered with a different method.
errors.googleConfig: Google OAuth configuration error. Please check Authorized redirect URIs: http://{BaseURL}/api/auth/callback/google
errors.emailRequired: Email consent is required for Kakao login. Please set account_email consent item in Kakao Developer Console.
errors.kakaoOauth: An error occurred during Kakao OAuth authentication. Please check Kakao Developer Console settings.

loading.sessionError: An error occurred while creating session.

account.created: Account has been created. Please wait for administrator approval.
